sentences.en: After load balancing server, visitors increase from 25 to 100.
sentences.cn: 经测试,系统采用负载平衡服务器后, 客户访问数由原来的25提高到100.

sentences.en: All data is stored on a central file server.
sentences.cn: 所有数据资料都储存在中央文件服务器里。

sentences.en: An active object that is an asynchronous request to the Message Server.
sentences.cn: 操做对象:某个激活的对象,担任对消息服务器的同步请求做响应.

sentences.en: Check the SMTP server configuration and correct any anomalies.
sentences.cn: 检查SMTP服务器配置及服务是否有任何异常.

sentences.en: How to install FTP Server for File Transfer service?
sentences.cn: 如何安装FTP服务来提供文件传输服务?

sentences.en: If yes, what are the server specifications?
sentences.cn: 如果是，服务器的规范是什么？

sentences.en: In contrast, the Universal Server architecture lets IS " have it your way. "
sentences.cn: 与之相反, 万能服务器的体系结构让IS “ 按自己方式拥有它 ”.

sentences.en: My server is having problems this morning.
sentences.cn: 我的服务器今天早上出了问题.

sentences.en: Replace my domain name section [ server - linux . info ] with your domain name.
sentences.cn: 取代我的网域名称的第 [ server -linux.info ] 与您的网域名称.

sentences.en: See how the ASP file will be returned from the server.
sentences.cn: 看看从服务器返回的ASP文件 里有些什么.

sentences.en: Server : Are you ready to order?
Server : May I take your order?
Server : Would you like your meat rare, medium or well done?
sentences.cn: 肉要烧成嫩的 、 不老不嫩的还是熟透的?

sentences.en: Server: Please help yourself to the salad bar. It's behind you.
sentences.cn: 色拉台有色拉,请随便用. 就在你们身后.

sentences.en: This can be done on any server of the cluster.
sentences.cn: 可以在集群的任何服务器中这样做。

sentences.en: This DNS server is not enlisted in the specified directory partition.
sentences.cn: DS没被列入指定的目录分区.

sentences.en: Well, only the server can do that.
sentences.cn: 嗯，只有服务器能做这项工作。

sentences.en: You can customise the behavior of the Asynchronous Server and hence re - brand it by defining your own command set for invoking services.
sentences.cn: 通过定义自己调用服务的命令集,您可以定制自定义异步服务器的行为,通过为调用服务定义自己的命令集从而对它重新标记.

sentences.en: You can customize the behavior of the Asynchronous Server and hence re-brand it by defining your own command set for invoking services.
sentences.cn: 通过定义自己调用服务的命令集，您可以定制自定义异步服务器的行为，通过为调用服务定义自己的命令集从而对它重新标记。

trans.tran_cn: 服务器 ，侍者，上菜用具，发球者
trans.tran_en: one of the computers on a network that provides a special service
